title: libgazebo_ros_api_plugin.so: undefined symbol on Ubuntu 12.04 since 2014/01/21

content.raw:
Since apt-get (dist-)upgrade yesterday, rosrun gazebo_ros gazebo fails with
```
symbol lookup error: /opt/ros/hydro/lib/libgazebo_ros_api_plugin.so: undefined symbol: _ZN3ros7console5printEPNS0_10FilterBaseEPN7log4cxx6LoggerENS0_6levels5LevelEPKciS9_S9_z
```

should be stemming from librosconsole.so
```
(grep -r 'ros.*console.*print.*FilterBase.*log.*Logger.*levels.*LevelEPK' /opt/ros/hydro/lib/libros*
Binary file /opt/ros/hydro/lib/librosconsole.so matches)
```

Relevant parts from dpkg -l:
```
gazebo-current                                2.2.1-1~precise
ros-hydro-gazebo-*-current             2.4.1-1precise
ros-hydro-rosconsole                       1.9.53-0precise-20140115-0235-+0000
```

Perhaps ros-hydro-gazebo*-current needs to be recompiled against current ros-hydro-rosconsole?
